sentences.english: The villagers beat drums and lit firecrackers.
sentences.chinese: 村民们敲锣打鼓放鞭炮。

sentences.english: It is the representative power of the villagers' representatives that forms the specific basis of the village.
sentences.chinese: 正是村民代表的代表能力构成了特定的村庄基础。

sentences.english: "There were thousands of them, " a villager told a local newspaper.
sentences.chinese: “青蛙的数量成千上万，”某村民向当地报社提到。

sentences.english: But in a culture that reveres age, some villagers refer to him dismissively as a "lad".
sentences.chinese: 在尊敬长者的文化中，一些村民对他轻蔑的称为青年。

sentences.english: Article 21 A villagers' assembly is composed of villagers at or above the age of 18 in the village.
sentences.chinese: 第二十一条村民会议由本村十八周岁以上的村民组成。

sentences.english: Article 21 A villagers' assembly is composed of villagers at or above the age of 18 in the village.
sentences.chinese: 第二十一条村民会议由本村十八周岁以上的村民组成。

sentences.english: Villagers built Ruiyuan themselves to improve their children's opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 村民们修建了瑞元小学，以期改善子女的教育境况。

sentences.english: The defeated soldiers reaved the villagers of their flocks of sheep.
sentences.chinese: 败兵抢走了村民的羊群。

sentences.english: Villagers are gathering at the entrance of the village to celebrate this year's grain harvest.
sentences.chinese: 村民们在村头集会，庆贺今年的粮食丰收。

sentences.english: The villager people the heart is unwilling, reached this money remit by post the town.
sentences.chinese: 村民们心不甘，便将这笔钱邮汇到了县城。

sentences.english: Those figures do not include the Hsiao-lin villagers.
sentences.chinese: 这些数据并没有包括小林村的村民。

sentences.english: The fisherman left the villagers and went home. But he could never find the place again.
sentences.chinese: 渔人告别村民回家以后，再也找不到这个地方了。

sentences.english: The villagers rushed down the street. Lorian was lost in the midst of them.
sentences.chinese: 村民们沿着街道向前涌去，洛里安也消失在人群中。

sentences.english: So, she used her magic and kept the villagers out of the forest; the two love birds were hence well protected.
sentences.chinese: 于是，施法将村民们赶出了森林，保护了这对恋人。

sentences.english: When the day arrived, the headman assembled all the villagers and led them into the jungle.
sentences.chinese: 到了约定时日，大臣召集全部村民，带入丛林。

sentences.english: Villagers gather outside a house whose walls cracked from an earthquake in Jalpaiguri, West Bengal.
sentences.chinese: 地震过后，村民们聚在一所遭损伤房屋的窗外。

definition: fellow countryman (from the same village)/local people/villager/the folks back home
villager/(Tw) (Internet slang) person who likes to follow online discussions and add their opinions
branch secretary/secretary of a branch of the Communist Party or the Communist Youth League/abbr. for 支部書記|支部书记
